Activités/Conception/Generate a test cas.title: Generate a Test case from user Stories
Activités/Conception/Generate a test cas.description: Utiliser l'IA générative pour transformer automatiquement des User Stories exprimées en langage naturel en cas d'utilisation structurés (use cases), afin d'améliorer la compréhension fonctionnelle et la couverture des scénarios métier.

Documentation/Docusaurus/intro.title: Tutorial Intro
Documentation/Docusaurus/intro.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.title: Congratulations!
Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.title: Create a Blog Post
Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.title: Create a Document
Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.title: Create a Page
Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.title: Deploy your site
Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.title: Markdown Features
Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-basics.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-extras.title: Manage Docs Versions
Documentation/Docusaurus/tutorial-extras.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.

Documentation/Template cas usage.title: Template cas d'usage
Documentation/Template cas usage.description: Use this template to create a Usecase file
